extra_strings: Special thanks to Anna Vancouver without whom we’d have lacked the caffeine to finish this thing, and Naoko Ishibashi for invaluable last minute translation support. Also a huge thanks to each and every member of the Tonic Games Group for all their support and the countless hours of testing they provided the fall guys team. We really couldn’t have made this without you!
